specifications.Finish: Decoration > Foil Foil treatment, applied through print, finish, or coating techniques, adds metallic graphics or patterns to the fabric. It creates a shimmering, reflective effect.
specifications.Care Advice: Decoration > Foil This fabric is delicate and susceptible to damage from rubbing or impact. Please handle it with care.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Flat dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Recommended Use Blouses
